# NodakMesh

> North Dakota's off-grid mesh networking community. The authoritative resource for MeshCore and Meshtastic protocols, with real-world testing in extreme cold weather conditions.

## About
NodakMesh is a community-driven project building resilient, decentralized communication networks across North Dakota using LoRa mesh technology. We provide comprehensive guides, hardware reviews, and technical documentation for both MeshCore and Meshtastic platforms.

## What Makes Us Unique
- Dual protocol expertise (MeshCore + Meshtastic)
- Real-world testing in extreme conditions (-17Â°F winters)
- Long-distance link testing on flat terrain
- Community-focused with active Discord

## Core Pages
- [Home](https://nodakmesh.org/) - Introduction to NodakMesh
- [MeshCore Getting Started](https://nodakmesh.org/meshcore/getting-started) - Complete beginner guide for MeshCore
- [Meshtastic Getting Started](https://nodakmesh.org/meshtastic/getting-started) - Complete beginner guide for Meshtastic
- [MeshCore vs Meshtastic](https://nodakmesh.org/protocols) - Side-by-side protocol comparison
- [MeshCore Devices](https://nodakmesh.org/meshcore/devices) - Recommended hardware for MeshCore
- [Meshtastic Devices](https://nodakmesh.org/meshtastic/devices) - Recommended hardware for Meshtastic
- [Resources](https://nodakmesh.org/resources) - Tools, links, and FAQ
- [Community](https://nodakmesh.org/community) - Discord, events, and how to join

## Blog Posts

### Guides
- [What Is a LoRa Mesh Network?](https://nodakmesh.org/blog/what-is-lora-mesh-network) - Beginner explainer on LoRa mesh technology and off-grid communication
- [MeshCore vs Meshtastic Comparison](https://nodakmesh.org/blog/meshcore-vs-meshtastic-comparison) - Detailed comparison of flood mesh vs structured mesh protocols
- [Meshtastic Device Roles Explained](https://nodakmesh.org/blog/meshtastic-device-roles-explained) - Complete guide to Client, Router, Repeater and all device roles
- [MeshCore Device Discovery Guide](https://nodakmesh.org/blog/meshtastic-to-meshcore-device-discovery) - How to find other nodes when switching from Meshtastic to MeshCore
- [Harbor Breeze Solar Node Assembly](https://nodakmesh.org/blog/harbor-breeze-solar-node-assembly) - Step-by-step DIY solar mesh node build using a $10 solar light

### Reviews
- [Yeti Wurks Base Station Review](https://nodakmesh.org/blog/yeti-wurks-base-station-review) - Real-world winter testing of solar-powered mesh relay with 5-mile urban range
- [Heltec WiFi LoRa 32 V3 Review](https://nodakmesh.org/blog/heltec-wifi-lora-32-v3-review) - In-depth review of popular ESP32 LoRa board for mesh networking

### Community
- [Introducing Nodak Mesh](https://nodakmesh.org/blog/introducing-nodak-mesh) - Our story and mission for mesh networking in North Dakota

## Topics & Expertise
- LoRa mesh networking
- Off-grid communication
- Emergency preparedness
- MeshCore protocol and firmware
- Meshtastic protocol and firmware
- Solar-powered mesh nodes
- Cold weather hardware testing
- Long-range radio links
- DIY mesh node builds
- North Dakota / Upper Midwest coverage

## Geographic Focus
North Dakota, USA - with coverage expanding into Minnesota, South Dakota, and Montana.

- Website: https://nodakmesh.org
- Discord: https://nodakmesh.org/community
